item.title: NVIDIA to Acquire Arm for $40 Billion, Creating World’s Premier Computing Company for the Age of AI
item.description: NVIDIA and SoftBank Group Corp. today announced a definitive agreement under which NVIDIA will acquire Arm Limited from SBG and the SoftBank Vision Fund in a transaction valued at $40 billion.

item.title: Getting The Most Out Of Anki
item.description: Anki is the most popular spaced repetition software (or SRS). At its heart, Anki is just a program for making and displaying flashcards, but the flashcards are shown to you on a schedule – ideally, close to the same day as you would have forgotten the card, and no sooner. This means you can remember more information in less time than with traditional study methods.
item.author: (Marcin S)

item.title: Thoughts on giving feedback
item.description: A good, blameless feedback culture is essential for working together efficiently as it forms healthy relationships, fuels personal and professional growth and aligns us with common norms. Feedback is one of the cornerstones of company culture.
item.author: (https://www.facebook.com/ochronus)

item.title: The Five Temptations of a CEO — cherif.ca
item.description: I recently read and enjoyed Patrick Lencioni’s The Five Temptations of a CEO . Although I didn’t care much for the fictional fable style in which it was written, I felt that the underlying lessons were powerful not just for CEO’s but for senior leaders in any organization. item.title: Super Mario Bros. 3 in 3 minutes - World Record Speedrun Explained
item.description:
Watch the unedited run here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AVf_pmH7NkA Explanation by KabAudio: https://pastebin.com/mPYVMA56
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/bismuth9 Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/bismuth9 Twitter: https://twitter.com/Bismuthi Discord: https://discord.gg/HuVcquK

Chapters: 00:00 - Introduction 00:37 - 1-1, Hammer Bros. 02:08 - 1-2 02:43 - 1-3 to World 7 03:51 - Credits Warp 04:48 - Pipe clip, out of bounds 07:04 - Note block crash 08:02 - Stack underflow, RAM as code 10:39 - Shell manipulation 12:25 - What can go wrong? 13:39 - Recap, Conclusion
